summary: Email correspondence between Assistant U.S. Attorney (USAFLS) and attorney Ted Leopold regarding the Epstein investigation, with Spencer Kuvin copied. The AUSA provides contact information and requests assistance, while Leopold indicates he will provide names the following day.

persons.name: Ted Leopold
persons.context: Email sender who states he will provide names related to the Epstein investigation the following day.

persons.name: Spencer Kuvin
persons.context: Copied on the email correspondence regarding the Epstein investigation.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney (USAFLS)
persons.context: Email recipient who provided contact information and thanked Ted Leopold for his assistance in the Epstein investigation.

connections.description: Corresponding regarding the Epstein investigation, with Leopold providing assistance to the AUSA.
Leopold copies Kuvin on email correspondence about the Epstein investigation.

events.title: AUSA Contact Information Provided
events.description: Assistant U.S. Attorney sends email with contact information to Ted Leopold regarding the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Leopold's Response on Names
events.description: Ted Leopold responds to the AUSA, indicating he will provide names related to the Epstein investigation the following day.

keyFacts: Ted Leopold indicates he will provide names related to the Epstein investigation on July 3, 2008.
Assistant U.S. Attorney based in West Palm Beach is actively seeking assistance in the Epstein investigation.
Attorney Spencer Kuvin is copied on the correspondence, suggesting his involvement or interest in the case.
